bibdata.abstract: This guide applies to power electronics components and systems on ships and similar applications. It summarizes current electrical engineering methods and practices for applying power electronics in electrical power systems on ships and describes analytical methods, preferred parameters, and performance characteristics from a common frame of reference for reliable integrated marine electrical power systems.
